alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morrill County through 645 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bayard, or 23 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bridgeport, Northport and Bridgeport State Recreation Area around 615 PM MDT. Court House And Jail Rocks around 620 PM MDT. The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 around 625 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
